brainly_data.question:
Which statement best describes the Great Depression?
Question 13 options:


A rapid growth in the US stock market from 1929-1937


A period of time after WWII that led to the Cold War


After a period of economic growth in the US, the economy experienced a severe recession triggered by the stock market crash in 1929


A slow shrinking of the stock market and US Economy from 1941-1954
brainly_data.subject: History
